achievementsSection.heading: Our Achievements
achievementsSection.subtext: Industry recognition that validates our mission to revolutionize education technology.

01.title: Best EdTech Innovation 2024
01.description: Recognized for revolutionary AI-driven assessment solutions that have transformed learning experiences for over 50,000 students across Europe.

02.title: Excellence in AI Education
02.description: Outstanding contribution to AI-powered personalized learning platforms with industry-leading 95% accuracy in adaptive assessments.

03.title: Student Success Impact Award
03.description: Measurable 40% improvement in student critical thinking and problem-solving capabilities through our adaptive learning methodology.

04.title: Startup of the Year
04.description: Most promising startup in education technology sector with 300% year-over-year growth and fastest market penetration.

05.title: Security Excellence Certificate
05.description: Achieved ISO 27001 certification for maintaining the highest standards in assessment security and data protection compliance.

06.title: Learning Innovation Prize
06.description: Creating adaptive learning environments that prepare students for future challenges, now implemented in 200+ institutions.

valuesSection.heading: Built on Excellence
